description:
A comprehensive tool for numerical analysis of broad range of physical phenomena in photonic devices

PLaSK (Photonic Laser Simulation Kit) is a comprehensive tool for numerical analysis of broad range of physical phenomena
in photonic devices. It has been designed for simulating mainly semiconductor lasers, however the range of the covered
devices is much larger and includes e.g. transistors, light emitting diodes, photodetectors, etc.
source: Lodz University of Technology, Photonics Group
